title: Trade credit insurance policies
dataVerified: Insured seller, buyer creditworthiness, coverage limits, credit terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake trade credit insurance. Domain binding verifies credit insurer (Euler Hermes, Atradius, Coface). Protects against buyer insolvency. International trade. Letter of credit alternative. Export credit agency (ECA) coverage.
